Name: Japanese Slipper
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Garnish with maraschino cherry dropped into cocktail.
Review: Sweet melon, orange liqueur and lemon. A bit of a sweetie, as its lurid green colour might suggest.
History: Created in 1984 by Jean-Paul Bourguignon at Mietta's Restaurant in Melbourne, Australia.
Nutrition: One serving of Japanese Slipper contains 139 calories
